Doctest Demos¶

This be the animal docstring at module level

Animal overview¶

An Animal is a base class that all animals, such as Cat and Dog inherit from.

Here’s what an Animal looks like:

class doctestdemo.animals.Animal(sound)¶

This be the Animal class docstring.

This is a base class for other animals (classes) to inherit from.

>>> class Dog(Animal):
...     def fetch(self, throw_this):
...         return throw_this
>>> dog = Dog('awoo')
>>> dog.fetch(44)
44
>>> dog.makes()
'awoo'
